how do i change a channel?
You can be in multiple channels at once.
IRC is better than all (well, most) chat systems.
This channel (#ubuntu) is mostly the support channel for Ubuntu Linux.
But there are many other channels in this network, and there are many other IRC networks.
First, find out the channel name. Then type /join #channelname

On Freenode, the "generic" chat channel is #defocus. (Usually one would use /list to see all channels in the network - but since this network is so big, that command could easily flood you off IRC for a while, so I really would not recommend using it.)
There are also websites such as http://irc.netsplit.de/ and http://searchirc.com/ that can search all channels in all networks.
